nl_prompt: Create a website for a  QR code generator.

function.description: Simple, welcoming text explaining what the website does.
Button that redirects users to the QR code generator page.
Allows users to input the text or URL to be encoded in the QR code.
Button to generate the QR code from the input provided.
Button that allows users to download the generated QR code.
Area where the generated QR code is displayed.
Appropriate error messages for invalid inputs.
Allows the user to input the size of qrcode box. Maxnium is 128.
Allows the user to select the error correction rate they want to adapt to the qrcode. Choices are "small", "medium" and "large". Default is medium.
Allows the user to input the size of qrcode border. Maxnium is 10.
Allows the user to select the fill color what they want qrcode is.
Allows the user to select the back color what they want qrcode is.
Details about the website, its purpose, and how it works.
List of frequently asked questions and their answers.
The privacy policy of the website.
The terms of service of the website.

function.test:
def test_introduction_text(driver, test_url, intro_text_css_selector):
	driver.get(test_url)
	intro_text = driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, intro_text_css_selector)
	assert intro_text.is_displayed()

parameter.name: test_url
parameter.description: the URL for the Home page

parameter.name: intro_text_css_selector
parameter.description: the CSS selector for the qrcode application introduction

function.test:
def test_generate_qr_code_button(driver, test_url, generate_qr_button_id, expected_url, generator_id):
	driver.get(test_url)
	button = driver.find_element(By.ID, generate_qr_button_id)
	button.click()
	assert driver.current_url == expected_url
	generator = driver.find_element(By.ID, generator_id)
	assert generator.is_displayed()

parameter.name: test_url
parameter.description: the URL for the Home page

parameter.name: generate_qr_navigate_button_id
parameter.description: the ID of the navigation button

parameter.name: expected_url
parameter.description: the URL of qr code generator page

parameter.name: generator_id
parameter.description: the ID of generator element

function.test:
def test_text_input_field(driver, test_url, text_input_id):
	driver.get(test_url)
	input_box = driver.find_element(By.ID, text_input_id)
	input_box.send_keys('https://example.com')
	assert input_box.get_attribute('value') == 'https://example.com'

parameter.name: test_url
parameter.description: the URL for the QR Code Generator page

function.test:
def test_enter_box_size(driver, box_size_input_id):
	box_size_input = driver.find_element(By.ID, box_size_input_id)
	box_size_input.send_keys('70')
	assert box_size_input.get_attribute('value') == '70'

def test_select_fill_color(driver, fill_color_select_id):

def test_select_error_correction_rate(driver, correction_rate_select_id):
	correction_rate_select = driver.find_element(By.ID, correction_rate_select_id)
	ui.Select(correction_rate_select).select_by_index(1)
	assert correction_rate_select.get_attribute('value') == 'M'

function.test:
def test_download_qr_code_button(driver, download_button_id, default_download_path):
	download_button = driver.find_element(By.ID, download_button_id)
	download_button.click()
	# Additional checks for file download can be added based on browser settings.
	expanded_download_path = os.path.expandvars(default_download_path)
	time.sleep(1)
	assert os.path.getsize(expanded_download_path) > 0

parameter.name: test_url
parameter.description: the URL for the QR Code Generator page

function.test:
def test_error_handling(driver, test_url, text_input_id, generate_button_id, error_message_css_selector):
	driver.get(test_url)
	input_box = driver.find_element(By.ID, text_input_id)
	input_box.send_keys('test')
	generate_button = driver.find_element(By.ID, generate_button_id)
	generate_button.click()
	error_message = driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, error_message_css_selector)
	assert error_message.is_displayed()

parameter.name: test_url
parameter.description: the URL for the QR Code Generator page

function.test:
def test_about_description(driver, test_url, about_description_css_selector):
	driver.get(test_url)
	description_text = driver.find_element(By.CSS_SELECTOR, about_description_css_selector)
	assert len(description_text.text) > 20

parameter.description: the URL for the About page
